short_summary: Replace fitness equipment in a Defense Forces facility.
description: A Contract for fitness equipment replacement in the Defense Forces facility in Halifax is issued. The bid will be evaluated based on lowest price. The soliciation number is WS4422851854. The tangible goods to be procured are: fitness equipment. The contact method of interest for this notice is email.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Fitness Equipment
#### Contract Reference: WS4422851854

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of fitness equipment for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Tender Overview**

* **Tender Title**: W0100-234478 Fitness Equipment
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4422851854
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type in French**: Demande de propositions

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Reference**: WS4422851854
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 23, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 4, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia
* **Trade Agreements**: CPTPP, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others (refer to the 'Trade Agreements' section for details)

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires fitness equipment for a new CFB Halifax Fitness & Sports Facility. The contractor is responsible for delivering all equipment duty-paid to Stadacona Fitness and Sports Center in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Proposals Evaluation Criteria**

* Responses will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**

* If you have any questions or concerns about this tender, please contact:
    * Name: Lisa Martin
    * Title: (SPAC/PSPC)
    * Email: [lisa.m.martin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.m.martin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Terms and Conditions**
Please review the contract terms and conditions, as well as any additional requirements and specifications outlined in the attached documents or listed on the website indicated in the notice. It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure they meet all requirements and specifications before submitting their proposal.

Please refer to the following link to review the Request for Proposal: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18672005

### End of Tender Announcement

Note: The 'Notice Type', 'Procurement Category', 'Procurement Method', and other categories are specified bilaterally (English-French) to cater to the Canadian federal government's requirement for bilingualism.  Also, ensure to refer to the official
